title:
New type of solutions for a critical Grushin-type problem with competing
  potentials
abstract:
In this paper, we consider a critical Grushin-type problem with double
potentials. By applying the reduction argument and local Poho\u{z}aev
identities, we construct a new family of solutions to this problem, which are
concentrated at points lying on the top and the bottom circles of a cylinder.
